amendment.description: Amendment adds a new title consisting of the text of H.R. 3219, the Native American Housing Assistance and Self-Determination Act, which establishes a block grant program to be administered by Indian tribes to provide housing assistance on Indian reservations. \ As amended by the Young (AK) amendment (A032), language was added to ensure that the Davis-Bacon Act applies to the construction of 12 or more units of Indian Housing. \ As amended by the Bereuter amendment (A033), language was added which authorizes funds appropriated to remain available until the next fiscal year or until expended, raises the maximum loan level to the same as FHA single-family loans, and provides that Ginnie Mae may purchase loans under the program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 as printed in the Congressional Record to add a new title to the bill, consisting of the text of H.R. 3219, the Native American Housing Assistance and Self-Determination Act. The amendment establishes a block grant to be administered by Indian tribes to provide housing assistance on Indian reservations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hayworth amendment (A031) as amended Agreed to by voice vote.
